name: Impromptu Vector Field Painter
description: Paint 3D Vector Fields and save them out to .FGA format for use in other software, or your own games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better. Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
